data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grismer, L. Lee, Wood, Perry L., Cota, Michael (2014): A new species of Hemiphyllodactylus Bleeker, 1860 (Squamata: Gekkonidae) from northwestern Thailand. Zootaxa 3760 (1): 67-78, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3760.1.4
